amendment.description: Amendment decreases construction funding for the Escalante Science Center by $1 million and increases funding for the National Trail Center in Casper, Wyoming.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to decrease construction funding for the Escalante Science Center by $1 million and increases funding for the National Trail Center in Casper Wyoming.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Regula amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
